webscript.description:
This webscript is used to change a password for a Cloud user. The Content-Body should have the form: 
    {
       "password" : "newPassword",
       "id" : "workflowId",
       "key" : "workflowKey"
    }
Note that the id and the key must match an in-progress workflow for the specified username. If the id is not recognised, or if the key does not match, a 404 will be returned.
